sentences.sContent: For the no-arguments case, we take the sequence [0 1] and concatenate it to an expression.

sentences.sCn: 对于没有参数的情况，我们获取序列 [0 1] 并将它连到一个表达式。

remMethod.val: con(共同) + caten(铁链) + ate → 在同一根铁链中 → 连锁

trans.tranOther: to link or join together, esp in a chain or series
